message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer in its field, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start the conversation at $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your interest in the product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $1100000. This is a very competitive price, and I believe it's a fair reflection of the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit above your previous offer. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the price you mentioned. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I'll counteroffer at $1050000. This is my best price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm willing to pay $1020000 for the product. Can we come to an agreement at this price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still a bit below my minimum target price. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll counteroffer at $1080000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I've reached my maximum budget for this purchase, Alice. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. This is my final offer. Please let me know if we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you've reached your maximum budget, Bob, but I'm still a bit below my minimum target price. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'll counteroffer at $1060000. This is my absolute final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
